bio: Olivia Müller is a precisionist painter from Zurich, known for her meticulous architectural paintings and urban landscapes. Her work captures the geometric beauty of modern cities with photographic detail, exploring the relationship between built environments and human experience.

media.videoPost: Capturing the precision of urban architecture from my Zurich studio window. Every line, every angle matters. The geometric beauty of modern cities fascinates me. Painting the relationship between built environments and human experience. #Precisionism #ArchitecturalPainting #ZurichArtist
